question: The Otter census for the first time in Uttar Pradesh was started from which of the following place?
explanation: The Otter census for the first time in Uttar Pradesh was started from Pilibhit Tiger Reserve. Otters are one of the carnivorous mammals in the subfamily of Lutrinae. The Pilibhit Tiger Reserve is located in the Pilibhit district and Shahjahanpur District of Uttar Pradesh.
